text: Guns from the USS Boston in Hamlin Park, 2020 Hamlin Park is an 80-acre public park in Shoreline, Washington. Most of the park is wooded area with dotted with trails. Two historic guns from the are mounted near the park's main playground. ==References== ==External links== * Hamlin Park - Washington Trails Association Category:Parks in Shoreline, Washington
title: Hamlin Park
